verses.roman:
nakaḍi, mukunda, sūrya, mādhava, śrīdhara
rāmānanda vasu, jagannātha, mahīdhara

synonyms: nakaḍi—of the name Nakaḍi; mukunda—of the name Mukunda; sūrya—of the name Sūrya; mādhava—of the name Mādhava; śrīdhara—of the name Śrīdhara; rāmānanda vasu—of the name Rāmānanda Vasu; jagannātha—of the name Jagannātha; mahīdhara—of the name Mahīdhara.
translation: Among Lord Nityānanda's devotees, Nakaḍi was the thirty-seventh, Mukunda the thirty-eighth, Sūrya the thirty-ninth, Mādhava the fortieth, Śrīdhara the forty-first, Rāmānanda the forty-second, Jagannātha the forty-third and Mahīdhara the forty-fourth.
